list.name: Stage begin events
list.query: event_type:SPARK_STAGE_STATE_EVENT AND state:BEGIN AND application_id:$application_id AND attempt_id:$attempt_id

list.name: Stage end events
list.query: event_type:SPARK_STAGE_STATE_EVENT AND state:END AND application_id:$application_id AND attempt_id:$attempt_id

list.name: Executor Added
list.query: event_type:SPARK_EXECUTOR_STATE_EVENT AND tag:YARN_APPLICATION AND state:ADDED AND application_id:$application_id AND attempt_id:$attempt_id

list.name: Executor Removed
list.query: event_type:SPARK_EXECUTOR_STATE_EVENT AND tag:YARN_APPLICATION AND state:REMOVED AND application_id:$application_id AND attempt_id:$attempt_id

list.name: Executor Blacklisted/Unblacklisted
list.query: event_type:SPARK_EXECUTOR_STATE_EVENT AND tag:YARN_APPLICATION AND NOT state:REMOVED AND NOT state:ADDED AND application_id:$application_id AND attempt_id:$attempt_id

panels.content: Container metrics/JVM detailed metrics for this app available here: [Yarn Application Dashboard for $application_id](dashboard/db/garmadon-yarn-application?orgId=1&var-username=All&var-framework=All&var-application_id=$application_id&var-component=All&var-container_id=All&var-hostname=All&var-uri=All)

targets.query: event_type:JVMSTATS_EVENT AND tag:YARN_APPLICATION AND application_id:$application_id AND attempt_id:$attempt_id
event_type:CONTAINER_MONITORING_EVENT AND type:MEMORY AND tag:NODEMANAGER AND application_id:$application_id AND attempt_id:$attempt_id
event_type:CONTAINER_MONITORING_EVENT AND type:MEMORY AND tag:NODEMANAGER AND application_id:$application_id AND attempt_id:$attempt_id

styles.linkTooltip: Click to display Spark Stages Detailled for this stage

targets.query: event_type:SPARK_STAGE_STATE_EVENT AND tag:YARN_APPLICATION AND application_id:$application_id AND attempt_id:$attempt_id

styles.linkTooltip: Click to display Spark Executor Detailled for this executor

targets.query: event_type:SPARK_EXECUTOR_STATE_EVENT AND tag:YARN_APPLICATION AND application_id:$application_id AND attempt_id:$attempt_id
event_type:SPARK_TASK_EVENT AND tag:YARN_APPLICATION AND application_id:$application_id AND attempt_id:$attempt_id

panels.content:
Executor: CPU Time the executors spends actually running all tasks of the stage (including fetching shuffle data).

Executor deserialize: CPU Time taken on the executors to deserialize all tasks of the stage

Executor run time: Time the executors spends actually running all tasks of the stage (including fetching shuffle data)

Jvm gc time: Amount of time the JVM spent in garbage collection while executing the stage 

Executor deserialize time: Time taken on the executors to deserialize all tasks of the stage

Result serialization time: Amount of time spent serializing all tasks of the stage result

panels.title: CPU Time spends actually running the stage (including fetching shuffle data)
Number of records read from the shuffle

panels.description: This only includes the time blocking on shuffle input data. For instance if block B is being fetched while the task is still not finished processing block A, it is not considered to be blocking on block B.
panels.title: Time the task spent waiting for remote shuffle blocks
Number of blocks fetched in this shuffle
Total number of records written to the shuffle
Number of bytes written for the shuffle
Time spent blocking on writes to disk or buffer cache

panels.description: The value of this accumulator should be approximately the sum of the peak sizes across all such data structures created in this task. For SQL jobs, this only tracks all unsafe operators and ExternalSort

targets.query: event_type:SPARK_STAGE_EVENT AND tag:YARN_APPLICATION AND application_id:$application_id AND attempt_id:$attempt_id

panels.title: Peak memory used by internal data structures created during shuffles, aggregations and joins

targets.query: event_type:SPARK_STAGE_EVENT AND tag:YARN_APPLICATION AND application_id:$application_id AND attempt_id:$attempt_id

panels.title: The number of bytes transmitted back to the driver as the TaskResult

targets.query: event_type:FS_EVENT AND application_id:$application_id AND attempt_id:$attempt_id AND uri:$uri
